theMushrooght:i1OvergrownMushroomRelic.NAME: Overgrown Mushroom
theMushrooght:i1OvergrownMushroomRelic.FLAVOR: This mushroom has been on you ever since you woke up... And it seems to have gone straight into your brain.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end turn, you lose 2 #yWeak, #yFrail and #yVulnerable.

theMushrooght:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theMushrooght:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theMushrooght:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theMushrooght:i3FertileCorpseRelic.NAME: Fertile Corpse
theMushrooght:i3FertileCorpseRelic.FLAVOR: It would be possible to make not bad stuffed rat. If it wasn't for mushrooms.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add Mushroom Growth into your hand.

theMushrooght:i11GigaparasiteRelic.NAME: Gigaparasite
theMushrooght:i11GigaparasiteRelic.FLAVOR: This parasite is TOO big. Where did the merchant get it?
